sentence.Network_en: At the door was a neatly dressed, dignified man.
sentence.Network_cn: 门口站着一位穿戴整齐、仪态庄重的男子。

sentence.Network_en: His finger nails were square and cut neatly across.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的手指甲是方形的，修剪得很齐。

sentence.Network_en: He folded his paper neatly and sipped his coffee.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把报纸整齐地叠起来，然后抿了口咖啡。

entry.def: A neat place, thing, or person is tidy and smart, and has everything in the correct place.

example.ex: So they left her in the neat little house, alone with her memories...
example.tran: 于是他们把她一个人留在整洁的小房子里，只有记忆陪着她。

example.ex: She undressed and put her wet clothes in a neat pile in the corner.
example.tran: 她脱掉衣服，把湿衣服整齐地码成一堆放在角落里。

entry.def: Someone who is neat keeps their home or possessions tidy, with everything in the correct place.

example.ex: 'That's not like Alf,' he said, 'leaving papers muddled like that. He's always so neat.'
example.tran: 他说道：“这不像是阿尔夫的风格，他不会把文件弄得那么乱。他一向很爱整洁。”

entry.tran: 匀整的;秀气的;小巧优雅的
entry.def: A neat object, part of the body, or shape is quite small and has a smooth outline.

example.tran: 姿色虽衰但五官清秀的女人

entry.def: A neat movement or action is done accurately and skilfully, with no unnecessary movements.

example.ex: A neat move between Black and Keane left Nigel Clough in the clear, but his shot skimmed wide of the far post.
example.tran: 奈杰尔·克拉夫凭借一次漂亮的跑位在布莱克和基恩之间扯出了空当儿，但是他的射门却大大偏出了远门柱。

entry.tran: 巧妙的;简洁的;简便易行的
entry.def: A neat way of organizing, achieving, explaining, or expressing something is clever and convenient.

example.ex: It had been such a neat, clever plan...
example.tran: 这曾是个如此巧妙、机智的计划。

example.ex: Neat solutions are not easily found to these issues...
example.tran: 很难找到解决这些问题的巧妙办法。

entry.def: If you say that something is neat, you mean that it is very good.

example.ex: 'Oh, those new apartments are really neat,' the girl babbled on...
example.tran: 那个女孩赞不绝口地说：“噢，那些新公寓真是非常棒。”

example.ex: It'll be neat to have a father and son playing on the same team...
example.tran: 爸爸和儿子同队效力，那真是太棒了。

entry.def: When someone drinks strong alcohol neat, they do not add a weaker liquid such as water to it.

example.ex: He poured himself a brandy and swallowed it neat...
example.tran: 他给自己倒了一杯白兰地，没兑水就一饮而尽。

example.ex: He took a mouthful of neat whisky, and coughed.
example.tran: 他喝了一口纯威士忌，咳嗽了起来。

sentences.sentence: "she put the slippers under the bed neatly"

auth_sentence.content: She makes the web very quickly and very neatly.
auth_sentence.res_content: She makes the web very quickly and very neatly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She makes the web very quickly and very neatly.

auth_sentence.content: Grief rarely churns out neatly or quickly, though.
auth_sentence.res_content: Grief rarely churns out neatly or quickly, though.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Grief rarely churns out neatly or quickly, though.

auth_sentence.content: A shop in...Chelsea...has neatly solved the male sartorial problem.
auth_sentence.res_content: A shop in...Chelsea...has neatly solved the male sartorial problem.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A shop in...Chelsea...has neatly solved the male sartorial problem.

Sentence.sentence: In the real world, problems rarely come neatly packaged, so being able to discern their deep structure is key.

sentences.en: Children must learn to write neatly.
sentences.cn: 孩子们必须学会整洁地写字。

sentences.en: Don’t fling your clothes into the drawer,put them in neatly.
sentences.cn: 不要把你的衣服随便往抽屉里一扔,把它们整齐地放在里面。

sentences.en: He tucked his trousers neatly into his boots.
sentences.cn: 他把裤腿利落地塞进靴子里 。

sentences.en: Sailors know how to wind up a long rope neatly.
sentences.cn: 水手们知道怎样把一条大绳利落地缠好。

sentences.en: The fighter neatly fenced off a dangerous blow.
sentences.cn: 这位拳击手灵巧地挡开了十分危险的一击。

sentences.en: The pencils fit neatly into this box.
sentences.cn: 铅笔放进这个盒子正合适。

sentences.en: The shed is neatly screened by a hedge.
sentences.cn: 小屋正好被一道树篱遮住。

sentences.en: The theories and measurements fitted together neatly.
sentences.cn: 理论与测出的数据恰好相符。
